description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity for an Android notes application. It sets up the navigation components including a BottomNavigationView and a FloatingActionButton to create and navigate to different fragments such as Notes, Categories, and Settings.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity serving as the single-activity host coordinating navigation and UI components for the Notes app.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the theme, layout, and configures navigation components.

methods.name: navigateToSettings
methods.description: Programmatically navigates to the Settings fragment.
